name: Super Magical Zombie Bride ! How I eat my husband and become a Magical Girl
name_original: Super Magical Zombie Bride ! How I eat my husband and become a Magical Girl
description:
Super Magical Zombie Bride is a side scroller shooter influenced by Metal Slug (sorry you can't get fat yet....) and magical girls ,this is a very early prototype,only one stage is playable, and main character model is a bit broken.. this prototype have 3 weapon available, the base one is already equiped, but you can try to find the 2 others hidden in the stage. you can play this game with a controller or a keyboard

  • Arrow keys/Left stick : move
  • X key/A Button : Jump
  • C key/X Button : Magical Shoot
  • V key/Y Button : Magical Bomb

Here a bit of lore: 

this is about a girl who turned into a zombie then ate her husband. she randomly encouter magical fairy n°67 who fall from the sky and turn her into a magical girl. With the help of the magical fairy n°67, she will search for the person who turned her into a zombie.
